General.ImageJSyntax: run("Calibration Bar...", "location=[PARA_STRING_1] fill=PARA_STRING_2 label=PARA_STRING_3 number=PARA_INTEGER_1 decimal=PARA_INTEGER_2 font=PARA_INTEGER_3 zoom=PARA_DOUBLE_1 PARA_BOOLEAN_1");
General.HelpString: Adds a Calibration bar on a specified position.

Parameter.Name: Location
Parameter.Value: Upper Right;Lower Right;Lower Left;Upper Left;At Selection
Parameter.HelpString: Defines the position of the Calibration bar.

Parameter.Name: Fill Color
Parameter.HelpString: The fill color of the Calibration bar.

Parameter.Name: Label Color
Parameter.HelpString: Defines the label color of the added Calibration bar.

Parameter.Name: Number of Labels
Parameter.HelpString: Number of labels display on the Calibration bar.

Parameter.Name: Font Size
Parameter.HelpString: Font size of the Scalebar label.

Parameter.Name: Zoom Factor
Parameter.HelpString: Zoom factor defining the size of the Calibration bar.
